706245f-a.text:
Pennsylvania Ave., (right), west side, south of Wortman to Fairfield Aves. Also seen is Sheffield Ave., in the right background. This view vas taken from New Jersey and Wortman Aves., looking south.
August 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
706245f-a.folder: Pennsylvania Avenue & Wortman Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
